Returns connection paths and warmth scor: Returns connection paths and warmth score to a LinkedIn profile
Sort a list of LinkedIn profiles by rela: Sort a list of LinkedIn profiles by relationship strength with the user
Enrich a single LinkedIn profile or Vill: Enrich a single LinkedIn profile or Village ID with an email address
Enrich a single person profile with basi: Enrich a single person profile with basic professional information and work history
Enrich multiple person profiles (max 10): Enrich multiple person profiles (max 10) with basic professional information and work history.
Enrich multiple LinkedIn profiles or Vil: Enrich multiple LinkedIn profiles or Village IDs with email addresses
Returns connection paths to a company us: Returns connection paths to a company using either its LinkedIn URL or domain URL
Sort a list of companies by relationship: Sort a list of companies by relationship strength with the user
Enrich a single company profile with bas: Enrich a single company profile with basic information including employee size, industry, and founding details
Enrich multiple company profiles (max 10: Enrich multiple company profiles (max 10) with basic information including employee size, industry, and founding details.
LinkedIn URL of the target person: LinkedIn URL of the target person
Specify the user making the request. Thi: Specify the user making the request. This identifier should match the one you used when integrating the user with Village.
Semicolon-separated list of LinkedIn URL: Semicolon-separated list of LinkedIn URLs or Village IDs
LinkedIn URL or domain URL of the target: LinkedIn URL or domain URL of the target company (URL encoded)
Array of company LinkedIn URLs or domain: Array of company LinkedIn URLs or domain URLs
